pages.text: Learn to craft and imbue jewelry with mystical properties. No ordinary gold, these trinkets can be imbued with magical properties, shielding you from harm, increasing your damage, and much more.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: Obtain $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/beryl_copper_ingot)Beryllium Copper$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst_shard)Amethyst Shards$() or $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/steel_ingot)Steel$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst_shard)Diamonds$()

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_jew.text: Craft your first piece of $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/copper_jewelry)Copper$() or $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets)Steel$() Jewelry. These have minor bonuses but we can go further.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/reagents.text: Imbued Jewelry is next, it comes with a variety of innate bonuses. Pick your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbuing_reagents)Reagent$() before imbuing your jewelry.
